DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate whether variant LOC387715 locus HtrA serine peptidase 1 ( HTRA1 ) gene within 10q26 locus associate polypoidal choroidal vasculopathy whether associated clinical pattern include angiographic phenotype Korean population .
DOC.brief_title: LOC387715/HTRA1 Variants Polypoidal Choroidal Vasculopathy Korean Population
DOC.detailed_description: This cross-sectional case-control study . One hundred Korean patient polypoidal choroidal vasculopathy 100 control subject genotyped LOC387715 ( rs10490924 ) HTRA1 gene polymorphism ( rs11200638 )
